data.title: Larry Wayne Weddington
data.meta_description: With heavy hearts, we announce the passing of Larry Wayne Weddington, loving father, retired safety training professional, and devoted member of West...
data.text:
With heavy hearts, we announce the passing of Larry Wayne Weddington, loving father, retired safety training professional, and devoted member of West Corinth Baptist Church in Mooresville, N.C. Larry was born on April 9, 1950, to the late Alvin Turner Weddington and Margie Louise Allman Weddington.

He served his country in the U.S. Navy and flourished in his career in the fiber industry. He found joy in hunting, fishing, golf, and baseball. Larry had a passion for archery and was crowned the South East archery NFAA/NAA Champion. He loved the beach, where he enjoyed shag dancing. Larry also enjoyed tending to his garden.

Left to cherish his memory are his daughter, Amy Weddington; his fiancee, Constance “Connie” Congdon; and siblings, Garry Weddington (Nell), Karen Baxter (Sonny), Mike Weddington (Teresa), and Dwight Weddington (Julie); and nieces and nephews, Benn Weddington, Bryan Weddington (Erin), Emily Weddington, Philip Baxter (Jo-Marie), Keith Baxter, Kim Ezzell, Cole Weddington, Summer Weddington, Jessica Juhaish (Brandon), Travis Weddington and Joseph Weddington; along with great nieces and nephews and one great-great nephew.

The Weddington family invites friends and loved ones to honor Larry’s life at his funeral service on Wednesday, July 17, 2024, at 11 a.m. at West Corinth Baptist Church in Mooresville. Rev. Rob Suttles will preside over the ceremony, followed by a burial at the church cemetery.

Prior to the service, a visitation will be held on Tuesday, July 16, 2024, from 6 to 8 p.m. at Cavin-Cook Funeral Home in Mooresville. In lieu of flowers, the family requests that memorials be directed to West Corinth Baptist Church. Please join us in celebrating Larry’s life and offering condolences to the family at www.cavin-cook.com.
